description: The daily mood and habit tracker to make the best out of yourself!

confirm-delete.title: Delete entry?
confirm-delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this entry? This action cannot be undone.

confirm-discard.title: Discard changes?
confirm-discard.description: You have some unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to discard those and continue?

confirm-discard-due-datechange.title: Discard changes?
confirm-discard-due-datechange.description: You are about to switch to another date and still have some unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to discard those and continue?
